snippet: A blogger who pleaded guilty in a conspiracy to break into a nursing home and shoot unauthorized video of the bedridden wife of Senator Thad Cochran was sentenced Monday to more than two years in prison.
abstract: Blogger Clayton Kelly is sentenced to more than two years in prison for his role in conspiracy to videotape Rose Cochran, late wife of Sen Thad Cochran, as she lay in her nursing home bed suffering dementia; images appeared online during Cochran's re-election campaign.
lead_paragraph: A blogger who pleaded guilty in a conspiracy to break into a nursing home and shoot unauthorized video of the bedridden wife of Senator Thad Cochran was sentenced Monday to more than two years in prison.

headline.print_headline: Mississippi: Video Ruse Leads to Prison
